entry.title: DENSE FOG ADVISORY THROUGH 10:00 A.M. WEDNESDAY
entry.summary: January 14, 2026 4:00 a.m. A Dense Fog Advisory is in effect until 10:00 a.m. Wednesday for central Douglas County. Forecasters at the National Weather Service in Medford said visibility of one quarter mile or less in dense fog is expected. The Advisory area includes Roseburg, Sutherlin, Myrtle Creek, Green, Glendale and surrounding areas. Forecasters...

entry.title: AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS THROUGH 10:00 A.M. FRIDAY

Forecasters at the National Weather Service in Medford said poor air quality will continue. This is due to an inversion and stagnant air conditions near the surface that will continue...

entry.title: Tractor Supply on Track to Open Roseburg Store in March
entry.summary: Tractor Supply Company is set to open its Roseburg store in March, with a soft opening planned for March 21 and a grand opening on March 28. The store will be located in North Roseburg Plaza and is expected to create about 15 local jobs.

entry.title: Roseburg Man Arrested After Knife “Joke” at Del Taco
entry.summary: A 33 year old Roseburg man was arrested after police say he displayed a knife and demanded money from an employee at a Del Taco, later claiming he was joking. The employee asked him to leave, and officers later arrested the man, who also admitted to an earlier theft.
